name: bazel-kotlin-vscode-extension
description: Extension to support Bazel with Kotlin Language Server

configurationSnippets.label: Debug Kotlin with Bazel
configurationSnippets.description: Launch a Kotlin binary using Bazel

bazelTarget.description: the bazel binary/test target to debug

mainClass.description: the main class for the binary/test target

buildFlags.description: a list of bazel flags to used in the bazel build by the debug adapter before launching the program

additionalArgs.description: an optional list of additional args to be passed to the main class

bazelKLS.path.description: Optionally a custom path to the language server executable.

bazelKLS.transport.description: The transport layer beneath the language server protocol. Note that the extension will launch the server even if a TCP socket is used.

bazelKLS.port.description: The port to which the client will attempt to connect to. A random port is used if zero. Only used if the transport layer is TCP.

bazelKLS.debugAttach.enabled.description: [DEBUG] Whether the language server should listen for debuggers, i.e. be debuggable while running in VSCode. This is ONLY useful if you need to debug the language server ITSELF.

bazelKLS.debugAttach.port.description: [DEBUG] If transport is stdio this enables you to attach to the running language server with a debugger. This is ONLY useful if you need to debug the language server ITSELF.

bazelKLS.debugAttach.autoSuspend.description: [DEBUG] If enabled (together with debugAttach.enabled), the language server will not immediately launch but instead listen on the specified attach port and wait for a debugger. This is ONLY useful if you need to debug the language server ITSELF.

bazelKLS.watchFiles.description: Specifies glob patterns of files, which would be watched by LSP client. The LSP client doesn't support watching files outside a workspace folder.

bazelKLS.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the Kotlin language server.

bazelKLS.jvmTarget.description: Specifies the JVM target, e.g. '11' or '17'.

bazelKLS.diagnostics.enabled.description: Whether diagnostics (e.g. errors or warnings from the Kotlin compiler) should be emitted.

bazelKLS.diagnostics.level.description: The minimum severity of diagnostics to emit.

bazelKLS.diagnostics.debounceTime.description: [DEBUG] Specifies the debounce time limit. Lower to increase responsiveness at the cost of possible stability issues.

bazelKLS.linting.debounceTime.deprecationMessage: The option has been renamed to `bazelKLS.diagnostics.debounceTime`
bazelKLS.linting.debounceTime.description: [DEBUG] Specifies the debounce time limit. Lower to increase responsiveness at the cost of possible stability issues.

bazelKLS.scripts.buildScriptsEnabled.description: Whether language features are provided for .gradle.kts scripts. Experimental and may not work properly.

bazelKLS.indexing.enabled.description: Whether global symbols in the project should be indexed automatically in the background. This enables e.g. code completion for unimported classes and functions.

bazelKLS.completion.snippets.enabled.description: Specifies whether code completion should provide snippets (true) or plain-text items (false).

bazelKLS.debugAdapter.enabled.description: [Recommended] Specifies whether the debug adapter should be used. When enabled a debugger for Kotlin will be available.

bazelKLS.debugAdapter.version.description: The debug adapter version from Github releases

bazelKLS.debugAdapter.path.description: Optionally a custom path to the debug adapter executable.

bazelKLS.debounceTime.description: [DEPRECATED] Specifies the debounce time limit. Lower to increase responsiveness at the cost of possible stability issues.

bazelKLS.externalSources.useKlsScheme.description: [Recommended] Specifies whether URIs inside JARs should be represented using the 'kls'-scheme.

bazelKLS.externalSources.autoConvertToKo.description: Specifies whether decompiled/external classes should be auto-converted to Kotlin.

bazelKLS.snippetsEnabled.description: [DEPRECATED] Specifies whether code completion should provide snippets (true) or plain-text items (false).

bazelKLS.inlayHints.typeHints.description: Whether to provide inlay hints for types on declaration sites or not.

bazelKLS.inlayHints.parameterHints.description: Whether to provide inlay hints for parameters on call sites or not.

bazelKLS.inlayHints.chainedHints.description: Whether to provide inlay hints on chained function calls or not.

bazelKLS.buildFlags.description: A list of build flags to be passed to the bazel build command during a sync.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
